steps.description: Defined disease mechanism: α-synuclein aggregation is linked to Parkinson's disease (PD).
Assays (fluorescence analysis, NMR chemical shift analysis) are relevant to the disease mechanism (aggregation and structural changes).
No explicit mention of controls or replicates in the provided text.
Standard techniques (fluorescence, NMR) are broadly accepted in the field.
No OddsPath calculation mentioned. Total benign/pathogenic variant controls not specified in the text.
